mapper.select: SELECT N.RN, N.NOTIC_NO, N.EMP_NO, N.BOARD_TITLE, N.BOARD_CONTENT, N.CREATE_DATE, N.MODIFY_DATE, N.BOARD_TOP, N.HIT FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NOTIC_NO DESC) AS RN, NOTIC_NO, EMP_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, BOARD_TOP, HIT FROM NOTIC) N WHERE N.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTIC (NOTIC_NO, EMP_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, BOARD_TOP, HIT) VALUES (NOTIC_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'N', 0)
